#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy
#Guidance for developers

= Development requirements =
  * Server with at least 6GB HD & 512 MB RAM. [http://www.vmware.com/products/server/ VMWare Server] recommended
  * Fast internet connection from the server (for downloads).  Most efficient if has DHCP server to auto-assign IP connection details
  * OpenSUSE 11.1 DVD - from [http://software.opensuse.org/]

= To install development system =
  # Boot from OpenSUSE 11.1 DVD
  # Press "Esc" at boot menu within 2 seconds
  # Enter following kernel parameter: install=cdrom:// autoyast=_one of the following:_
    * http://so-class2.googlecode.com/files/autoyast-file.xml _sub in correct name for autoyast-file.xml_
    * floppy:///_autoyast-file_.xml  _sub in correct autoyast filename in root of floppy
    * device://_usb-device_/_autoyast-file_.xml  _e.g. usb-device=sdb1_
  # Continue with installation
